body: This a good manhwa but the MC is an asshole. I don't know what I would do if I was in that one guys shoes. I would be filled with rage.
If you wanna continue reading, just know that despite mc having a fucked up past he is an ass hole and trash of humanity. But ofc the artwork is 10/10 hot ngl. Good fap material.
Yeah this is fucked up, but next chapter(39) is freaking hot.
Yo this is fucked up the art is awesome but this is still fucked up
The mc is an asshole despite he was given a backstory, he’s still an asshole. I would shoot him dead if he tries to
This is fucked up. Hot, but still pretty fucked up.

Wow his wife straight said i love you kevin, she gave no shits about her husband being there to hear that sucks to be him. Hurry up with next one, i want too see if there marrige is done, if it is kevin is a savage asshole in my book cause he is having joy ruining ppl lives
Koreans really know how to make hot men and women. I know there's no one manhwa art style, but they tend to be similar.
I could’ve sworn this was finished & full translated a long time ago.
